title: System Topology Manifest
description: Defines the structure of a System Topology Manifest (STM).

name.description: Unique name of the service or application.

description.description: Short summary of the service's purpose.

appType.description: Role in the ecosystem (worker, frontend, utility, etc.).

trigger.description: Systems or events that activate this node.

input.description: Upstream systems and data types consumed.

output.description: Downstream systems and data types produced.

maintainer.description: Team or contact responsible for the service.

version.description: Optional semantic version of the manifest.
